comment: I hope the beer doesn't live up to the name!

Heh :) We'll see. Had originally intended it as a low abv, low bitterness kegger, but got a little carried away with the hopping. The cluster that I used are fairly old, so I don't think it will be as bitter as the recipe would suggest. I'm liking the sound of your Tunnocks beer by the way, would like to try that one!
